17a1242f2f972c029bd1aa74729df550::2025-1.summary: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu has formally requested a pardon from President Isaac Herzog to end his ongoing corruption trial, which includes bribery and fraud charges. da0b25c5182dcb925f913f3d1e32a17c::2025-1.summary: Severe floods caused by torrential rain and Cyclone Ditwah have affected Sri Lanka, Indonesia’s Sumatra, southern Thailand, and northern Malaysia, killing nearly 1,000 people in less than a week. Hundreds remain missing, especially in Indonesia and Sri Lanka, where rescue efforts are ongoing. Military and emergency teams have been deployed, but some areas remain inaccessible. This is Sri Lanka’s worst natural disaster since the 2004 tsunami.

ea16c6b4eec75f0785a5e09bcfba61aa::2025-1.summary: A long-lost painting by 17th-century Flemish artist Peter Paul Rubens, depicting the crucifixion of Jesus Christ, was discovered by an auctioneer in a Paris townhouse in 2024. bdb047daf2934d1eab797e2fe5d7dca1::2025-1.summary: The US and UK have reached a deal eliminating tariffs on pharmaceutical imports, following earlier US threats of tariffs up to 100% on branded drugs. The deal aims to facilitate trade and ensure continued access to new medicines in both countries.

90d7b97d45c063b9120a5ef0f3237fc7::2025-1.summary: Costco, along with companies such as Revlon Consumer Products Corp. and Kawasaki Motors Manufacturing Corp., has filed lawsuits seeking refunds if tariffs imposed during Donald Trump’s presidency are reduced or eliminated. The lawsuits aim to recover payments made under these tariffs. The cases are ongoing.

c771f26789a7c4acd458c5152e924eb5::2025-1.summary: On Cyber Monday, thousands of Shopify users experienced outages, with some merchants unable to log in or access point-of-sale systems, according to the company. Shopify acknowledged the disruptions and said it was working to resolve the issues affecting select merchants.

Shopify acknowledged the disruptions and said it was working to resolve the issues affecting select merchants.

81a629f665b8ae7eff00d55f2d770f90::2025-1.summary: Former private equity executive David Gentile, who was convicted of defrauding thousands of investors, has had his prison sentence commuted by former President Donald Trump. Gentile was previously found guilty of investment fraud. The commutation means Gentile will be released from prison, but his conviction remains.

380c5a0486bf001ca8e83ec60c3c0fa2::2025-1.summary: Former private equity executive David Gentile, who was convicted of defrauding thousands of investors, has had his prison sentence commuted by former President Donald Trump. Gentile was previously found guilty of investment fraud. The commutation means Gentile will be released from prison, but his conviction remains.

37f8bca0fd145e0afce1e676a6b7c81e::2025-1.summary: Shares of Airbus fell sharply on Monday after reports emerged of quality issues affecting dozens of A320 aircraft. The news led Airbus to become the biggest decliner on the pan-European Stoxx 600 index. The company has not yet provided detailed comments on the reported issues.
